Text: keygen doesnt work correctly, creating fake serial numbers

worked for me thanks :) all i did was first open the key gen, typed my name and clicked generate, double clicked on the key and it copied it to clipboard then i opened superduper clicked to register and used the same name i used for the keygen and it registered.
sorry, i clicked on superduper in the top apple menu bar then went to register, used the name i had used for the keygen and then right clicked, pasted the key and clicked ok and it registered ok.
ok!   using a different name, that works perfectly
The key generator does work.  Just type in your own name instead of the one it gives you
Keygen did not work. Used given name. Used different name. Not working.

Worked flawlessly! 

Simple installation: 
Extract both .rar's 
Run SuperDuper -> Go to File -> Register
Run Keygen -> Type in a name -> Generate
Double click on the serial and paste into SD with the name.
Done.

If this product helps you as it did me, do what I did, buy it. It's great to first test out the whole product.
